titleStmt.title: Dolus an virtus?, or, An answer to a seditious discourse concerning the religion of England and the settlement of reformed Christianity in its due latitude to which are added, the votes of Parliament.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A34534 of text R19442 in the English Short Title Catalog (Wing C6252A). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 73 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 21 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

titleStmt.title: Dolus an virtus?, or, An answer to a seditious discourse concerning the religion of England and the settlement of reformed Christianity in its due latitude to which are added, the votes of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Erroneously attributed by Wing to John Corbet, this piece is a reply to Corbet's A discourse of the religion of England...(1667).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

keywords.term: Corbet, John, 1620-1680. -- Discourse of the religion of England.
